questions.question_text: Which component becomes unavailable for a maximum of 80 seconds during a nondisruptive Cisco NX-OS upgrade?

discussion.content:
It is C.
Automated, one-step upgrade using the install all command: This upgrade is nondisruptive. The install all command upgrades all modules in any Cisco MDS 9000 Family switch. Cisco recommends having dual supervisors installed on the MDS switch while performing a nondisruptive upgrade. Although a nondisruptive update doesn’t require a switch reload, it disrupts the control plane for about 80 seconds.

choices.D: all vHBAs from the service profile that correspond to this server
choices.B: all vNICs from the service profile that correspond to this server

comments.content: To monitor traffic from a server, add all vNICs from the service profile corresponding to the server.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B is correct

comments.content:
it says lan traffic, so must be vNIC. 
vHBA does storage traffic like FC.

discussion.content: or is it B bcs maybe not all traffic in the server goes through the uplink, so we use the traffic actually from the server ports individually??
from the same link below, it also states that we can use as source the Ethernet uplink port. Why not use that, since we want all the traffic in the LAN?

questions.question_text:
//IMG//
Refer to the exhibit. An engineer must monitor all LAN traffic on Fabric A from a blade server. Which source should be configured in the test-span monitor session to complete this task?

//IMG//
Refer to the exhibit. A network engineer must configure an authentication solution for Cisco UCS with these conditions:

• Two-factor authentication must be enabled for all UCS user authentication.
• All AAA packets must be encrypted and use TCP port 49 to establish communication.

Which set of actions meets these requirements?

choices.B:
Remove the LDAP provider.
Create a TACACS+ provider in user management.
choices.D:
Create the RADIUS group mapping.
Change the RADIUS group rule in a RADIUS provider.
choices.C:
Create the LDAP provider.
Change the LDAP group rule in an LDAP provider.
choices.A:
Delete the LDAP group mapping.
Create a RADIUS provider in user management.

questions.question_text:

• Bridge domain: Test_Telco
• Application profile: PROD_App
• Tenant: PROD

Which value for application_profile_dn on line 2 must be used to automate the creation of EPG Red_Test_VM using Terraform?

discussion.content:

look for terraform example is C

Answer is C. If you have user TF, you know it.
